name: homemadekahoot-frontend
description: Frontend for HomeMadeKahoot - English Learning Game Platform

scripts.start:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local node scripts/setupCloudflareEnv.js && env-cmd -f .env.cloudflare.tmp cross-env PORT=3010 ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/setupCloudflareEnv.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -f .env.cloudflare.tmp cross-env PORT=3020 ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true react-scripts start
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/setupCloudflareEnv.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -f .env.cloudflare.tmp cross-env PORT=3030 ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true react-scripts start
